visual.name: chartexposankeydiagram
visual.description: Multilevel Sankey Diagram tool for Power BI to visualize your data in few clicks. Sankey Diagram is Power BI custom visual that helps you to make smarter decisions by visualizing hidden relationships in your data. You can clearly find the sources, destinations and steps in between and how the information flow across them all in one quick glance.

showUnSubscribeLink.description: Use this button to show the “Cancel” link in the top right corner of the chart. Click on that link to cancel the subscription.
